metadata.description:
Dec. 18th 10:00am ET... Summoning everyone:  Marty Ray needs your help! Mint your Beardos and set them all free.
 
 If all goes as planned, Marty will meet you on the 19th in the Beardoverse for an exclusive show! Each of you can free up to 3 Beardos: We're counting on y'all...
metadata.name: Beardoverse #1
